% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\Tm(\Gamma)} && {\Ty(\Gamma)} \\
	\\
	{\Tm(\Delta)} && {\Ty(\Delta)}
	\arrow["{\tau_{\Gamma}}", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\tau_{\Delta}}"', from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\Tm(\sigma)}"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\Ty(\sigma)}", from=1-3, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
